Interesting. This NPE is impossible unless a method on an object can be 
invoked before the constructor completes. We assert a non-null value on the 
input to the constructor (IResource) before assigning but it is null when 
accessed in the getName method. I have made the instance variable involved 
final just as a precaution but that doesn't really change anything. Perhaps it 
is a VM issue (either a bug or a misstated stack trace).
